iPay will be pleased to discuss any concern or scope of improvement in our Payment Application. Please feel free to contact us.

Tap + to add a person to your Trusted Network.

If you forget your password and try to recover it, we will send text messages to the persons in your Trusted Network.

We have sent you a token money to your %1$s account. Please check with your bank and enter the token amount.

Steps to verify a bank account: 

Step 1. iPay will send a small amount of money to your bank account, this may take 3–5 business days. 
Step 2. You have to contact your bank to know the exact amount. 
Step 3. Tap the name of your bank and select Verify. 
Step 4. Enter the exact amount and tap OK. 

*Entering an incorrect amount 5 times will permanently block the bank account.
Do you want to invite this person to iPay? By inviting to iPay you acknowledge that you know this person personally.

We will deposit a random amount in your bank account as a part of verification process. You need to provide the deposited verification amount to link the bank with your iPay account. Please note that, bank verification process may take up to 3 working days.

A secure payment system that you may choose for your daily transactions.
iPay money is fast and you can send and receive money instantly.

We love to see you happy in shopping and we are here to make payments for your purchases.
Whether you are paying bills, sending money or making purchase, iPay is here to keep your financial information secure.

Adding money from banks is the most reliable way to update your balance. It takes 3–5 business days to add balance into your iPay wallet.

%1$s can use up to a certain amount monthly for making payments using your iPay wallet. You will have to take the full liability of the transactions made by %2$s using your iPay wallet. You can remove the privilege whenever you want and can change the monthly limit.
You can add other iPay users as your beneficiary . The beneficiary account holder can make payment using your account. To add a beneficiary, you need to follow the instructions below
